description: This source file defines the OrdersViewModel class which extends Android's ViewModel class. It is intended to handle logic related to order listing and delivery tracking within the shopping app's frontend. The class currently contains a TODO comment indicating future implementation for exposing LiveData of orders, tracking deliveries, and calling an OrdersRepository.

classes.name: OrdersViewModel
classes.description: Class responsible for handling logic related to orders and delivery tracking in the shopping app frontend.
